means: <美><加>（赛马或跑狗中的）正序连赢

PerfectNetExp.abs: 赌球术语 ... Even money( 等额投注) Exacta( 指定连赢位置) Exotic wager( 特殊投注).

如果客户进行顺次序科士达(Exacta)或反向科士达(Reversed Exacta)投注，且同时提供了非次序科士达(Quinella)投注盘时，所有投注 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1960s: from American Spanish quiniela exacta 'exact quinella'

means.word_mean: 1. a bet that you can pick the first and second finishers in the right order
